thread.section_title: BIGWORDS.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BIGWORDS.com | bigwords.com
thread.title: Samantha M.

author: Samantha M.
title: Samantha M.
text:
I was skeptical of this website at first; there is so much going on and it almost looked like a spam-attacked website.
But it is SO REAL.
It is humorous, very orange, and they looked at over 100 book renting options to find me the lowest price. The redirecting to each website was super easy, and I actually received my books in the mail! (again, I was waiting to be scammed)
HIGHLY recommend this site. I wish I had known about it sooner.
